refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: If the HTML Forms Module is used, html:form elements can be used in most of the places where para can be used.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: XHTML defines a html:form element that can be used to add interactivity to web pages. The HTML Forms Module for DocBook allows html:form elements to be used in DocBook documents.
A complete description of XHTML is outside the scope of this reference.
